entries.journal_entry_description: Han Solo is not welcome on Tansarii Point Station. He needs your help to sell the goods that he acquired.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Talk to Han Solo and find out why he needs your help.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You learned that Han Solo is not welcome on Tansarii Point Station and needs your help to sell the goods that he has. He will give you a cut of the profits.  Talk to Inaldra and find out what you need to do.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Cargo Director needs to arrange for the shipment transfer. Talk to him and find out what he needs to transfer the cargo.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The bartender of Tansarii Point Station has several contacts that may wish to buy this cargo from the station and can give a reasonable price estimate. Find out what it is.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The Security Forces Director needs to approve the cargo, to make sure that it is not hazardous.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Talk to the Security Forces Director
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Talon Karrde owns Tansarii Point Station. For business that isn't specifically approved by Inaldra, he insists that his personal approval is necessary.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Using this as an invisible gate to inaldra
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Now that you have completed her tasks, return to Inaldra and let her know.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Go to the Hangar Bay to give Han the good news that you have moved his shipment and collect your payment.
